entity.name: Ramp
entity.doc: Create a sequence of tokens with increasing value

property.name: text
property.value: Restart the count from N - 1 whenever the start input is not absent.

property.name: text
property.value: Output true when the count is == 0 and the input is absent. Otherwise, output absent.

property.name: text
property.value: Output true when the count is > 0 and a new click command arrives. Otherwise, output absent.

property.name: text
property.value: Number of ticks that must elapse after a single tick before a single tick is asserted. E.g., if this value is 3, and a click occurs at tick 1, then it will be asserted to be a single click at tick at tick 4.

property.name: text
property.value: Upon detecting a double click, reset the count loop to the default -1.

property.name: text
property.value: Given input mouse clicks, output a "true" on singleClick if it is a single click or a "true" on doubleClick if it is a double click. A double click occurs for each two clicks with fewer than N absent inputs between them.

property.name: text
property.value: Output a true if the input is absent. Otherwise, the output is absent.

property.name: text
property.value: Output true when the count is == 0. Otherwise, output absent.

property.name: text
property.value: Restart the count whenever the start input is not absent.

property.name: text
property.value: Given an input integer n, produce n putputs with value false, starting in the current tick, followed by an output true. Each time the input is present, restart the timer.

property.name: text
property.value: NOTE: This can wrap around if the absent for long enough.
